title: Looking for Players to learn new positions with and mess around on Draft with.
body:
I'm currently Silver 5 and mainly play mid but looking to learn Jg. I Just want to find players that will play for fun and enjoy playing draft with each other while learning new things on the way. 
Add me if you want to play Draft and mess around by testing new builds in different positions. 

We may mess around a lot but will still try to win.

replies.body: I'll play with you. I've added you as well.{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
I'll play with you. I've added you. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
